00011 NPIdentifier ScriptingBridge::id_paint;
00012 
00013 // Method table for use by HasMethod and Invoke.
00014 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Method>*
00015     ScriptingBridge::method_table;
00016 
00017 // Property table for use by {Has|Get|Set|Remove}Property.
00018 std::map<NPIdentifier, ScriptingBridge::Property>*
00019     ScriptingBridge::property_table;
00020 
00021 // Sets up method_table and property_table.
00022 bool ScriptingBridge::InitializeIdentifiers() {
00023   id_paint = NPN_GetStringIdentifier("paint");
00024 
00025   method_table =
00026     new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>;
00027   if (method_table == NULL) {
00028     return false;
00029   }
00030   method_table->insert(
00031     std::pair<NPIdentifier, Method>(id_paint,
00032                                     &ScriptingBridge::Paint));
00033 
00034   property_table =
00035     new(std::nothrow) std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>;
00036   if (property_table == NULL) {
00037     return false;
00038   }
00039 
00040   return true;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ScriptingBridge::~ScriptingBridge() {
00044 }
00045 
00046 // Class-specific implementation of HasMethod, used by the C-style one
00047 // below.
00048 bool ScriptingBridge::HasMethod(NPIdentifier name) {
00049   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00050   i = method_table->find(name);
00051   return i != method_table->end();
00052 }
00053 
00054 // Class-specific implementation of HasProperty, used by the C-style one
00055 // below.
00056 bool ScriptingBridge::HasProperty(NPIdentifier name) {
00057   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00058   i = property_table->find(name);
00059   return i != property_table->end();
00060 }
00061 
00062 // Class-specific implementation of GetProperty, used by the C-style one
00063 // below.
00064 bool ScriptingBridge::GetProperty(NPIdentifier name, NPVariant *result) {
00065   VOID_TO_NPVARIANT(*result);
00066 
00067   std::map<NPIdentifier, Property>::iterator i;
00068   i = property_table->find(name);
00069   if (i != property_table->end()) {
00070     return (this->*(i->second))(result);
00071   }
00072   return false;
00073 }
00074 
00075 // Class-specific implementation of SetProperty, used by the C-style one
00076 // below.
00077 bool ScriptingBridge::SetProperty(NPIdentifier name, const NPVariant* value) {
00078   return false;  // Not implemented.
00079 }
00080 
00081 // Class-specific implementation of RemoveProperty, used by the C-style one
00082 // below.
00083 bool ScriptingBridge::RemoveProperty(NPIdentifier name) {
00084   return false;  // Not implemented.
00085 }

00087 // Class-specific implementation of InvokeDefault, used by the C-style one
00088 // below.
00089 bool ScriptingBridge::InvokeDefault(const NPVariant* args,
00090                                     uint32_t arg_count,
00091                                     NPVariant* result) {
00092   return false;  // Not implemented.
00093 }
00094 
00095 // Class-specific implementation of Invoke, used by the C-style one
00096 // below.
00097 bool ScriptingBridge::Invoke(NPIdentifier name,
00098                              const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00099                              NPVariant* result) {
00100   std::map<NPIdentifier, Method>::iterator i;
00101   i = method_table->find(name);
00102   if (i != method_table->end()) {
00103     return (this->*(i->second))(args, arg_count, result);
00104   }
00105   return false;
00106 }
00107 
00108 // Class-specific implementation of Invalidate, used by the C-style one
00109 // below.
00110 void ScriptingBridge::Invalidate() {
00111   // Not implemented.
00112 }
00113 
00114 bool ScriptingBridge::Paint(const NPVariant* args,
00115                             uint32_t arg_count,
00116                             NPVariant* result) {
00117   PiGenerator* pi_generator = static_cast<PiGenerator*>(npp_->pdata);
00118   if (pi_generator) {
00119     DOUBLE_TO_NPVARIANT(pi_generator->pi(), *result);
00120     return pi_generator->Paint();
00121   }
00122   return false;
00123 }

00125 // Called by the browser when a plugin is being destroyed to clean up any
00126 // remaining instances of NPClass.
00127 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00128 void Invalidate(NPObject* object) {
00129   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->Invalidate();
00130 }

00139 // Called by the browser to invoke a function object whose name is |name|.
00140 // Called by NPN_Invoke, declared in npruntime.h
00141 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00142 bool Invoke(NPObject* object, NPIdentifier name,
00143             const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00144             NPVariant* result) {
00145   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->Invoke(
00146       name, args, arg_count, result);
00147 }
00148 
00149 // Called by the browser to invoke the default method on an NPObject.
00150 // In this case the default method just returns false.
00151 // Apparently the plugin won't load properly if we simply
00152 // tell the browser we don't have this method.
00153 // Called by NPN_InvokeDefault, declared in npruntime.h
00154 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00155 bool InvokeDefault(NPObject* object, const NPVariant* args, uint32_t arg_count,
00156                    NPVariant* result) {
00157   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->InvokeDefault(
00158       args, arg_count, result);
00159 }

00162 // plugin class being queried.

00166   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->HasProperty(name);

00169 // Returns the value of the property called |name| in |result| and true.
00170 // Returns false if |name| is not a property on this object or something else
00171 // goes wrong.

00175   return static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object)->GetProperty(name, result);

00196 // Called by NPN_CreateObject, declared in npruntime.h
00197 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass

00202 // Cleans up the plugin-side instance of an NPObject.
00203 // Called by NPN_ReleaseObject, declared in npruntime.h
00204 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass

00206   delete static_cast<ScriptingBridge*>(object);

00211 // Represents a class's interface, so that the browser knows what functions it
00212 // can call on this plugin object.  The browser can use the methods in this
00213 // class to discover the rest of the plugin's interface.
00214 // Documentation URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en/NPClass
00215 NPClass pi_generator::ScriptingBridge::np_class = {
00216   NP_CLASS_STRUCT_VERSION,
00217   pi_generator::Allocate,
00218   pi_generator::Deallocate,
00219   pi_generator::Invalidate,
00220   pi_generator::HasMethod,
00221   pi_generator::Invoke,
00222   pi_generator::InvokeDefault,
00223   pi_generator::HasProperty,
00224   pi_generator::GetProperty,
00225   pi_generator::SetProperty,
00226   pi_generator::RemoveProperty
00227 };
